BackstoryDef.title: Advanced model
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a high-end mass-produced Android model; [PAWN_pronoun] AI imprint uses a higher-order sentience emulation technologies than are available on most Urbworlds. It is highly stable and with sufficient life experience is able to fool Voight-Kampff exams not administered by Rick Deckard.

BackstoryDef.title: Artifical Child model
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was designed to replace a human being in every way; [PAWN_pronoun] AI imprint uses sentience emulation technologies that are illegal throughout all civilized worlds as it designed to make humans irrelevant.
